actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A concurrent resolution supporting National Men's Health Week.

summary.text: Resolves that the Congress supports National Men's Health Week. Requests that the President call on the American public and interested groups to observe National Men's Health Week with appropriate ceremonies and activities.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution supporting National Men's Health Week.
